name: Ext_R4_ActivityDefinition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ActivityDefinition.subject[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.subject[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Type of individual the activity definition is intended for
element.definition: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the activity being defined.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R5 `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `canonical` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Type of individual the activity definition is intended for
element.definition: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the activity being defined.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R5 `ActivityDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `canonical` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The possible types of subjects for an activity (E.g. Patient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, etc.).
